segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene unfold, it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sun streams in through the open window, illuminating dust motes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my attention is drawn to the sink, where water is just gushing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing completely, making a sheet cascade onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's this woman, right there, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea; her foot is literally in the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of what's happening around them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin those beautiful wooden cabinet doors and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing, as if nothing in the world is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, if it weren't for the potential water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the cold water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just baffling to me, a true marvel of obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR
